name: Sales Report by Type
query:
SELECT  c.name                      AS "Customer:Link/Supplier:250",
        si.name                     AS "Invoice Number::150",
        si.vfd_rctvnum              AS "VFD No::75",
        si.posting_date             AS "Invoice Date::100",
        si.vfd_date                 AS "VFD Date::100",
        si.base_net_total           AS "AMOUNT_VAT_EXCL:Currency:200",
        si.total_taxes_and_charges  AS "VAT_AMT:Currency:150",
        si.base_rounded_total       AS "AMOUNT_VAT_INCL:Currency:200",
        si.taxes_and_charges        AS "Sales Taxes and Charges Template:Link/Sales Taxes and Charges Template:350"
FROM   `tabSales Invoice` si
        INNER JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` sii
            ON sii.parent = si.name
       INNER JOIN `tabCustomer` c
               ON si.customer = c.name
WHERE  (si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s)
   and si.docstatus = 1
   and si.is_pos = if(%(is_pos)s = "No", 0, 1)
GROUP BY si.posting_date, si.vfd_rctvnum, c.name, si.name
ORDER BY si.name
